flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: REGIROCK was sealed away by peoplenlong ago. If this POKéMON’s body isndamaged in battle, it is said to seekfout suitable rocks on its own to repairnitself.
REGIROCK’s body is composed entirely ofnrocks. Recently, a study made thenstartling discovery that the rocksfwere all unearthed from differentnlocations.
A POKéMON that is made entirely of rocksnand boulders. If parts of its body chip offnin battle, REGIROCK repairs itself bynadding new rocks.
It is entirely composed of rocks with nonsign of a brain or heart. It is a mysteryneven to modern scientists.
It is entirely composed of rocks with nonsign of a brain or heart. It is a mysteryneven to modern scientists.
Its entire body is made of rock.nIf any part chips off in battle, itnattaches rocks to repair itself.
Its entire body is made of rock.nIf any part chips off in battle, itnattaches rocks to repair itself.
Its entire body is made of rock.nIf any part chips off in battle, itnattaches rocks to repair itself.
The same rocks that form its bodynhave been found in ground layersnaround the world.
The same rocks that form its bodynhave been found in ground layersnaround the world.
Tout son corps est fait de roche.nS’il s’ébrèche au combat, il utilisendes pierres pour le réparer.
Its entire body is made of rock.nIf any part chips off in battle, itnattaches rocks to repair itself.
Tout son corps est fait de roche.nS’il s’ébrèche au combat, il utilisendes pierres pour le réparer.
Its entire body is made of rock.nIf any part chips off in battle, itnattaches rocks to repair itself.
Its entire body is made of rock.nIf any part chips off in battle, itnattaches rocks to repair itself.
Its entire body is made of rock.nIf any part chips off in battle, itnattaches rocks to repair itself.
ぜんしんが　いわで　できている。nたたかいで　からだが　かけてもnいわを　くっつけて　なおしてしまう。
전신이 바위로 되어 있다.n싸움으로 몸이 깨어져도n바위를 붙여서 치료해 버린다.
Tout son corps est fait de roche. S’il s’ébrèche auncombat, il utilise des pierres pour le réparer.
Sein Körper besteht aus Stein. Bricht im Kampfnetwas heraus, wird es durch Stein wieder ersetzt.
Su cuerpo está hecho de roca. Si se astilla durante elncombate, emplea piedras para repararlo.
È formato interamente da rocce. Se si staccanonnella lotta, ne cerca altre per sostituirle.
Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips offnin battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
全身が　岩で　できている。n戦いで　体が　欠けてもn岩を　くっつけて　治してしまう。
からだを　つくっている　がんせきとnおなじ　ものが　せかいじゅうのnあらゆる　ちそうで　みつかっている。
몸을 이루는 암석과n같은 것이 세계 곳곳의n여러 지층에서 발견되고 있다.
Les roches qui composent son corps se retrouventnégalement dans les diverses couches terrestres.
Die Steine, aus denen sein Körper besteht,nstammen aus den unterschiedlichsten Ecken der Welt.
Las rocas que componen el cuerpo de Regirocknpueden encontrarse en todos los estratos geológicos.
I tipi di roccia che compongono il suo corpo possonontrovarsi in tutti gli strati geologici del mondo.
The same rocks that form its body have been foundnin ground layers around the world.
体を　作っている　岩石とn同じ　物が　世界中のnあらゆる　地層で　見つかっている。
むかし　ひとに　ふういんされた　ポケモン。nたたかいで　からだが　くずれると　じぶんでnあたらしい　いわを　さがして　なおすと　いう。
오래전 사람에게 봉인된 포켓몬이다.n싸움으로 몸이 부서지면 스스로n새로운 바위를 찾아서 고친다고 한다.
Regirock fut isolé par les gens il y a très longtemps.nLorsque le corps de ce Pokémon est endommagénau combat, on raconte qu’il cherche des rochers pournse réparer.
Regirock wurde vor langer Zeit von Menschennweggeschlossen. Wenn der Körper dieses Pokémonnim Kampf Schaden nimmt, sucht es nach passendennSteinen, um sich selbst zu reparieren.
A Regirock lo mantuvieron encerrado y aislado hace tiempo.nDicen que, si resulta dañado en combate, se pone él mismona buscar piedras parecidas a las suyas y se las pone paranrecomponerse.
Molto tempo fa Regirock era stato imprigionato dagli esserinumani. Se subisce danni in lotta, cerca nuove rocce adattenper riparare le rotture.
Regirock was sealed away by people long ago. If thisnPokémon’s body is damaged in battle, it is said to seeknout suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.
昔　人に　封印された　ポケモン。n戦いで　体が　崩れると　自分でn新しい　岩を　探して　直すと　いう。
からだを　つくっている　がんせきは　すべてnちがう　とちから　ほりだされた　ものであるとnさいきんの　けんきゅうで　はんめいした。
몸을 이루고 있는 암석은 모두n다른 땅에서 파내진 것들이라고n최근 연구를 통해 판명됐다.
Le corps de Regirock est entièrement constitué de rochers.nRécemment, une étude a découvert que ces rochersnprovenaient de lieux très variés.
Regirocks Körper besteht komplett aus Steinen.nErst kürzlich stellte man erstaunt fest, dass dienSteine alle an unterschiedlichen Orten ausgegrabennwurden.
Regirock está formado en su totalidad por piedras. En unnestudio reciente, se descubrió que cada una de las piedrasnhabía sido desenterrada en sitios distintos.
Il corpo di Regirock è formato interamente da pietre.nDa un recente studio è emerso che ogni pietra provienenda un luogo diverso.
Regirock’s body is composed entirely of rocks. Recently,na study made the startling discovery that the rocks were allnunearthed from different locations.
体を　つくっている　岩石は　すべてn違う　土地から　掘り出された　ものであるとn最近の　研究で　判明した。
